channel.title: Please help with a game!
channel.description:
Hi everyone! I am really really sorry for posting this, but I really need your help!
There is a new game called Anvilglint Chronicles that is released very soon and everyone who registers before the 2 April gets in-game stuff and RL cash.
I’d be extremely grateful and in your debt if you could register using my referral key, it’s: [b]rs157dal[/b]
And here is the link!
It only takes a couple of seconds, seriously! Please, even if you’re not going to play the game you’re not losing anything! The registration is really simple you just select login and pass and that’s it! 10 seconds of your time and you help me *a lot*!
I know that this is spam and you have all rights to delete this message and ban me, blahblah, I don’t object, this is fair and square, but I was simply hoping that there are goodhearted people around that don’t care about clicking a link once and helping addicted gamer like me. =)
If you help me and like the game too – I’m Dreamer on the forums! Contact me and we’ll play together!
Thanks a lot!

item.title: Please help with a game!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

The Reaper X:

Advertising isn’t allowed. Posting here will only get users mad at you, rather than want the to help you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Who the fuck took my name.

Read full topic
